title: Elementary English Education Design Integrating Local Culture

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English Conversation and Grammar Proficiency
context.additional_context: Learners are familiar with local cultural elements and are interested in both enhancing cultural identity and language proficiency in English education. Digital resources can be utilized in a BYOD environment.

learning_goals: Learners can produce three or more English project outcomes themed around local culture (e.g., traditional food, festivals, art).
Learners can deliver an oral presentation of five minutes or more using English expressions that reflect cultural context.
Learners can revise project deliverables two or more times based on peer feedback.

resources: Regionally Culturally Relevant Digital Resources (Images, Videos, Audio)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
